Description.Text: ibis Saint Denis Stade Ouest is modern 3-star property offering convenient accommodation in the northern suburbs of Paris. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, onsite dining and a good location close to the Stade de France. The hotel is situated south of the canal in the commune of Saint-Denis. Regional places of interest include Stade de France, Saint-Denis Basilica, Montmartre hill, Sacre Coeur Basilica and Parc de la Villette. Saint Denis - Porte de Paris metro station is located in the vicinity, providing quick and easy access to the centre of Paris. The hotel is housed in a 20th-century low-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a bright, modern style with wood floors and contemporary artwork above the bed. Amenities include air-conditioning, satellite TV, a work desk and an en-suite bathroom. Courtepaille Comptoir serves French specialities in a relaxed setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the bar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
